definitions.definition: An extended narrative poem in elevated or dignified language, celebrating the feats of a deity, demigod (heroic epic), other legend or traditional hero.
definitions.example: The Icelandic epic took all night to recite.

definitions.definition: A series of events considered appropriate to an epic.
definitions.example: The book was an epic in four volumes.

definitions.definition: In software development, a large or extended user story.
